评论详情: Good quality, even after multiple washes. I ordered a large and wear size 12 pants. The only thing is the elastic on the waist is thick and not adjustable. So don’t let the draw string fool you. Comfortable, I have 2 pair
Purchased as gift and love the soft material
They are aft very cute and light weight.The fit as they say .Wuality of the pajamers seem ok .

So I was excited when these arrived,being a homebody they looked like they would be comfortable.  I myself am not usually a crop top kind of person,but It always depends on the appearance in the advertised photos. In the pictures it showed even though a crop top they looked long enough that it would be something I would wear.however they got here and after trying the 2 on I found them to be too short for my liking.  Then the pants which are super soft,I wore a pair the first night and they were also too short for my legs and they were bothering my calfskin because they had been too tight.
Cool for the summer. You can wear them as lounge outfits or every day sweat suits. They are real cool and comfortable.
Comfy and a good fit but thread is unraveling after just a few uses.

评论概述: Good value for the price, has some loose strands
评论详情: Great value for the price. Only downside is it tears at the seams. After a couple washes, there are some pulls in the shirt and pants. The shirt is more of a crop top and it is very short. Other than that, very comfortable.

I bought these despite not having any reviews (and I’m big on reviews) - they are so soft and feel like good quality, the tops are a little shorter than I thought and the pants are super comfy, perfect length for 5’4”, but they are weirdly saggy in the front, balloons out and not too flattering (and I have a mom pooch) I also wish the pants had pockets. - I’m undecided on keeping them since the quality is good.
Shirt a bit short and rides up at night. But pants are very comfortable
Two outfits at this price is a great deal! It’s not incredibly flattering on my body shape but it is comfortable. Works well as pajamas. Colors are pretty! Lightweight fabric.

For the price, this set is a good value.  You get two sets in different colors.  they are comfortable and easy to wear.  Good if you are staying in or to wear to run some quick errands.  I enjoy wearing each set.

评论概述: Amazing outfits to wear around the house
评论详情: I love a good 2 piece that I can throw on to lounge around the house. These are great for that. I do not recommend wearing out the house because the material is thin like pajamas and are see through. I mostly got these to lounge around the house on lazy days and and work from home days. They are soft and comfy.

I got this set for my preteen daughter. I got a size medium and they fit her perfectly. Shes 5’3 and 120 pounds. They are a soft material. They can be work as pajamas, but they can be worn outside as well. I think the price point and this coming as a set of 2 is definitely a bargain They’re comfortable and soft to the touch. I like the colors and they’re easy to wash. They’re light weight so even during the summer months they don’t feel harsh or heavy to wear. The elastic waistband is perfect for her as she grows like a weed and is a preteen , so currently her weight is fluctuating a bit. I do think they feel like a good quality set. I’d wear them myself.

I am size 2 and I bought the medium size of this pajama set. Surprisingly it fit well. I am 5' 2" and the length of the pants was perfect. The shirt want really a crop top on me though. The fabric is pretty comfortable, very light and elastic. The waistband of the pants is stretchy as well and the drawstring on the pants does effectively tighten and loosen the waistband. The color of the green set is more blueish than it looks like on Amazon. The white set matches exactly. Cute outfit and pajama set. Nice

评论概述: Nice lightweight set - perfect for summer PJs
评论详情: Despite being long (or cropped length for taller people) pants, these are super lightweight and comfortable to wear as pajamas, or for lounging around the house on the weekend.  There were a few loose threads, but not too bad considering the price of these sets - you get two sets for $35.
I got these for my daughter and they were a perfect it!! She love how they feel and how comfortable they are!

评论概述: These are 2 I think will turn heads at the gym and I like it when they do.
评论详情: They are comfortable, roomy, fit good and well made.

评论概述: cute and comfy but strong smell
评论详情: These are super comfy and I was excited to try these on and wear them as loungewear. However, I cannot wear them because they have an strong, awful smell to them, even after washing and drying and washing again and air drying and then air drying some more and then washing again and air drying. It smells like someone doused them in gasoline. I am disappointed that they are unwearable. Another thing I wanted to point out is that the material is thin and the stitching is okay and has held up to the washings but I am not sure how long the hems will hold up.
